EmailTemplate.description: Use to respond to a Pilot's Guide email request. Template provides download instructions.
EmailTemplate.name: Pubs - Pilot's Guide Requests
EmailTemplate.subject: Pilot's Guide Request CASE-{!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your request to obtain a Pilot’s Guide from BendixKing. All Pilot’s Guides are available on our website.
You can view and download BendixKing pilot guides at https://bendixking.com/en/databases-and-manuals.
If you have any questions, please let us know.
Thank you,
BendixKing Technical Publications Team
pubs@bendixking.com
Access our publications online at myaerospace.com
{!EmailMessage.TextBody}
